Message:
While no crystals
fell onto our island,
cursed creatures crossed over
the narrow strait and attacked us.

As everyone scattered
trying to escape,
I was unlucky enough to catch
some of the creatures’ attention.

I escaped into the woods,
but they relentlessly
chased me down.

I desperately ran for my life,
but when I stopped to catch
my breath, I heard the sudden
rumble of footsteps...

After the creatures bit my leg
and knocked me over,
they slowly inched
their way towards me.

No... I don’t wanna die!
Not here...!!

...It was then that
I heard that voice.

There it was,
lying on the ground—
a sword with a blade
as black as night.
